Laser Breath is an attack used by Grimlock, not a bot.

Anyways 

Branded c=
ontinued to flee for her spark as automatic fire hit all around her, she wa=
s to busy to feel the pain now, she'd stop to patch herself up later.



On=
 the other side of the battle Arty used all his strength and finally forced=
 his way free from the debris. Cut and ripped metal covered his battle torn=
 body. He'd already exhausted his missle supply leaving him with only his s=
houlder cannons to fight with.

  From: a=

2001 11:38 AM

  Sludge/Artemis:

 =
 Sludge used his tail to beat Laser Breath while Artemis fired 25 times aga=
inst Branded

ct: Re: The bum and the hole...


    Laser Breath struck Branded causing h=
er to lose her concentration. she could
    hear creaking and knew that the=
 roof was weekened by her attack. She pulled
    out a grenade, "Two words =
for you lizard breath BREATH MINT." she tosses the
    grenade toward the c=
harging Dinobot, "Here have this one." She'd hoped that
    the monster att=
acking her was as dumb as he acted.

    The roof collapsed forcing the dru=
nk to jump back, Branded transformed to
    her truck mode, "The battles lo=
st Cybrats, I'm getting out of here, you
    might want to do the same."
